abstract: After their reluctance to join an earlier alliance, Wal-Mart, Gap and others are joining another plan for Bangladesh led by a nonprofit group in Washington.
snippet: After their reluctance to join an earlier alliance, Wal-Mart, Gap and others are joining another plan for Bangladesh led by a nonprofit group in Washington.
lead_paragraph: Feeling pressure from consumer and labor groups for not doing more to ensure factory safety in Bangladesh, Wal-Mart, Gap and numerous other retailers along with the nation’s main retail federations are seeking to forge a new plan to promote safety in that country’s apparel industry.

headline.main: U.S. Retailers Announce New Factory Safety Plan
headline.print_headline: U.S. Retailers Announce New Factory Safety Plan

abstract: Each of us has a finite reservoir of energy in any given day. But there are techniques to avoid feeling exhausted.
snippet: Each of us has a finite reservoir of energy in any given day. But there are techniques to avoid feeling exhausted.
lead_paragraph: I had just finished facilitating a daylong workshop for a team of leaders at Walmart when I received a voicemail telling me my flight from Bentonville, Ark., that evening had been canceled and I would not be able to get home until sometime the next day.
